Package util

Class DBConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • util.DBConnector
  • public class DBConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    The DBConnector class connects and disconnects from the database, performs queries and database updates, stores the logged in user, and updates customer and appointment data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DBConnector()

      Closes the database connection.
